title: WottleNFT: SDGs Driven NFT Auction
description: How can Cardano align their values with the UN Sustainable Development Goals?
solution: WottleNFT aims to align the values of Cardano to SDGs by having the highest bidder choose the SDG and Social Enterprise that they support.
experience:
